about_the_game:
Welcome to Unity-Chan: Desktop Companion, a unique blend of virtual companionship, interactive gaming, and advanced AI chat, all brought to life with the charming anime character, Kohaku Otori (also known as Unity-Chan). Dive into a world where your desktop isn't just a workspace, but a lively environment filled with fun, interaction, and friendship!

IMPORTANT:

OpenAI API account is required to use some of the game features. The GPT API service is paid as you use, all metrics and billings are available on OpenAI site. Game provides tutorial how to set up account. All mini games are available without setting up text generation API, but it takes out most important feature of interacting with Unity-Chan.

Unity-Chan: Desktop Companion is a mix of various genres:
  • Desktop Assistant: Unity-chan can hang out on your desktop, where she spends time with you as you focus on your work, watch videos or play games. Thanks to modern text-generation AI you can chat with her about anything, and even share pictures with her to comment and discuss on
  • Dating Sim: Chatting is not just plain exchanging text and information. Unity-chan has special reactions for messages that make her feel happy, laugh or annoyed. All this influence her general mood and may change how she reacts to other subjects, and with time she opens up to you and likes you more. And who knows, maybe you will become the one who she trusts most?
  • Mini games: Interact with your virtual friend on another level by visiting her room and playing games with her there, with games varying from casual puzzle to more complex action shooter!

Unity-Chan is all alone on your desktop and she doesn't have many friends outside of high school, so don't be shy and visit her in her room and chat while playing mini games together. Spend time with her playing mini games like Tic-Tac-Toe and Match-3 to more complex like Virus Offense - a top-down shooter where both you and Unity-chan fight against waves of cyber enemies!

If you are busy at work and don't have time to play mini games with her, you can still use her help and ask her about anything. Being powered by advanced text-generation AI she can become your source of quick access knowledge with more pleasant delivery than plain chat interface. Or a good source for silly jokes, lyrics or stories to lighten your mood. It's your story and she can make your daily life more colorful. Gain her trust and be nice to her so she may reward you with her friendship and share her story with you! Or make fun of her and make her angry, so she may argue with you or even refuse to cooperate completely, choice is yours.

Key features:

  • Advanced AI chat powered by modern text generation AI API and optional text-to-speech
  • Additional systems simulating Unity-Chan's mood, emotions and relation with player
  • Set up calendar reminders and let her learn facts about you
  • Visit her in her virtual room where you can play various mini games with her like Tic-Tac-Toe and Match-3
  • Play more advanced mini game on her TV console
  • Switch between desktop mascot mode and streamer mode, where she looks like a streamer watching your screen
  • if you're an advanced user, you can ask her to run commands to automate your work


The game uses official Unity-Chan assets based on Unity-Chan License (© Unity Technologies Japan/UCL)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT1030
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: An AI desktop companion with her own personality and a virtual room to play various mini games with her. "Hi! My name is Kohaku Otori, but everyone calls me Unity-Chan! I just found a way to visit you on your desktop, may I come? 🧡"
